title: AR Applications Engineer, Photos - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space. It allows us to do things we love in ways never before possible, all while staying connected to the people around us.
description: You will work on features for and relating to the Photos app, impacting the way customers use the product and experience their memories. You will work with Apple's UI framework, Human Interface designers, and system software teams, utilizing technologies like SwiftUI and RealityKit.
preferred_qualifications: Interest or proficiency in UI/UX design, Proficiency in macOS or iOS app development, Experience in AR/VR applications, Familiarity with ARKit and/or RealityKit, Experience with 3D software
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is part of the total compensation package and is between $135,400 and $204,000. Employees can become Apple shareholders, receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, free services, tuition reimbursement, bonuses, commission payments, and relocation support.
